name: ohmstudio
description: portable virtual modular synth platform that aims to be fun, usable, collaborative, and extensible. UI designed for ohmbre hardware synthesizer or similar touchscreen device, yet it is fully cross-platform.

scripts.install: chmod -R +w brig && npm install ./brig && npm install ./mathjs && (npm install ./alsa || npm install ./node-core-audio)

author: Matt Gattis
